ch.bildspur.postfx

Interface Supervisor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PostFXSupervisor

    public interface Supervisor
    Handles the pass buffer and render technique.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearPass(processing.core.PGraphics pass)
      Clear a pass (black with alpha).
      void compose(processing.core.PGraphics graphics)
      Compose and finalize rendering.
      processing.core.PGraphics getCurrentPass()
      Get current pass of the pass buffer.
      processing.core.PGraphics getNextPass()
      Get next pass of the pass buffer.

      Returns pass buffer resolution.
      void pass(Pass pass)
      Apply pass to texture.
      void render(processing.core.PGraphics graphics)
      Start a new multi-pass rendering.
      void setResolution(int width, int height)
      Reset the resolution of the pass buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • setResolution

        void setResolution(int width,
                   int height)
        Reset the resolution of the pass buffer.
        Parameters:
        width - New width of the pass buffer.
        height - New height of the pass buffer.

      • getResolution

        int[] getResolution()
        Returns pass buffer resolution.
        Returns:
        Int array as shader uniform.

      • render

        void render(processing.core.PGraphics graphics)
        Start a new multi-pass rendering.
        Parameters:
        graphics - Texture used as input.

      • pass

        void pass(Pass pass)
        Apply pass to texture.
        Parameters:
        pass - Pass to apply.

      • compose

        void compose(processing.core.PGraphics graphics)
        Compose and finalize rendering.
        Parameters:
        graphics - Texture to render onto.

      • getNextPass

        processing.core.PGraphics getNextPass()
        Get next pass of the pass buffer.
        Returns:
        Next pass of the pass buffer.

      • getCurrentPass

        processing.core.PGraphics getCurrentPass()
        Get current pass of the pass buffer.
        Returns:
        Current pass of the pass buffer.

      • clearPass

        Clear a pass (black with alpha).
        Parameters:
        pass - Pass to clear.
